name: SOS (Same Old Story)
description:
"You know the score...

It's the same old story."

You are hitchhiking on a desert road. A man stops. Offers to take you on board. It's your first choice. Not the last, because on this road, danger is everywhere...

a visual novel by Marc Falvo

Original images from "Cruel sera le désert"

directed by Félix Létot and written by Marc Falvo

with Anne-Charlotte Piau, Timothée Spriet and Audrey Robin

Music extract from "My Love & The Dog of War"

by Warp Music Community (aka François Borne)

Testing - Natacha Falvo

Made for the SuNoFes Jam 2021. Enjoy !
